ISSUE.TITLE: Recognize CC licenses with https URLs
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: https://gpodder.net/directory/+license contains a list of licenses. When selecting a license the podcasts that use this particular license are shown. In https://github.com/gpodder/mygpo/blob/1950aae95d79c87bf703ec7f457fd84c2c9613f4/mygpo/web/utils.py#L204 the license URLs are matched against known patterns to show "nice" names instead of URLs. For creative commons licenses, only http URLs are recognized. http and https URLs should be recognized as identical.
